devdoc.details: Do not manually set balances without updating totalSupply, as the sum of all user balances must not exceed it.

userdoc.notice: Modern and gas efficient ERC20 + EIP-2612 implementation.

errors.message: Unnamed return variable can remain unassigned. Add an explicit return with value to all non-reverting code paths or name the variable.
